HomePage.banner_title: Up to 70% of IT projects fail— Fyndo helps non-tech founders take control.
HomePage.banner_subtitle: Fyndo helps non-technical businesses and investors prevent budget overruns, screening issues, and unrealistic estimates with clear, fixed-price packages.
HomePage.saving_heading:
Lower Costs, and Better Decisions—
Fyndo Saves You Up to 74%.
HomePage.saving_three_headingone: No Bots, No AI — Made in Germany, Run by Experts
HomePage.Easy_title:
We Keep It Simple –
 2  Fixed-Price Packages to Fit Your Needs.
HomePage.Easy_subtitle:
Fyndo bridges tech and business. No jargon, no fluff—just clarity.
 We support you within few hours.
HomePage.estimation_subheading: Whether launching or upgrading, you’re flooded with free estimates. Everyone’s selling—only few are honest. We deliver clarity and real numbers, so you cut through sales talk and negotiate what actually matters.
HomePage.estimation_list_itemoneheading: Your Project reviewed by CTO’s and Leads
HomePage.estimation_list_itemonetext: CTOs and Tech Leads with minimum 8+ years U.S./EU experience craft your estimation. Crafted by humans. No AI, no copy-paste templates.
HomePage.estimation_list_itemtwoheading: Trust the Numbers. Believe the Solution.
HomePage.estimation_list_itemtwotext: Trustworthy numbers and tech stacks clarity you can build on—for strategy, insight, or investor trust.
HomePage.estimation_list_itemthreetext: Your technical project breakdown— delivered as a PDF by email within 72 hours.
HomePage.screening_subheading: Choosing between two candidates? Fyndo’s coding test—based on Silicon Valley standards—shows who’s truly tech-strong. Make a smart, data-backed hiring decision that saves time, money, and onboarding headaches.
HomePage.screening_list_itemoneheading: Your Candidates. Our Test. 1:1 Coding + Soft Skills
HomePage.screening_list_itemonetext: We’re testing your two candidates with 30-minute live coding and 30-minute soft skills interviews. Total: 2-hours Silicon Valley-standard candidate evaluation.
HomePage.screening_list_itemtwotext: While others waste days on paperwork, we deliver IT support starting the next business day.
HomePage.screening_list_itemthreetext: You’ll get a detailed PDF reports for each candidate by email — ready to help you decide with clarity.
HomePage.fyndo-steps-heading:
In just 3 steps,
 you're much closer to your mission.
HomePage.fyndo-steps-subheading: We make it super easy for you—we handle the technical parts and deliver the clarity you need without any confusion or delay.
HomePage.fyndo-stepone-subheading: Choose the best-fitting package—or both! If you have any detailed questions, we're here and available most of the day to help.
HomePage.fyndo-steptwo-subheading: We offer a digital, transparent payment process. An invoice will be emailed—Please ensure your email and phone number are correct so we can reach you.
HomePage.fyndo-stepthree-subheading: Once payment is made, we’ll reach out via email or phone. Please send all project details by email. Final reports for both packages will be emailed.
HomePage.fyndo-steps-heading2: We protect your vision with NDAs and strong ethical commitment.
HomePage.fyndo-steps-subheading2: Your mission, idea, or project is fully secure—thanks to our values-driven approach and clear NDA-backed confidentiality commitment.
HomePage.fyndo-stepfour-subheading: As a European company, we follow DSGVO regulations. Fyndo secures your data, protects your privacy, and is grounded in ethics—helping founders and investors with trust and transparency.
HomePage.fyndo-stepfive-heading: We’ll Sign Your NDA or Share Ours
HomePage.fyndo-stepfive-subheading: We’re happy to sign an NDA before starting. You can provide your own, or we’ll gladly offer ours— ensuring confidentiality and trust from the very beginning.
HomePage.fyndo-stepsix-subheading: All data and communication remain confidential. We never sell, trade, or share your information with any external services—your privacy and security are always guaranteed.
HomePage.tech-stack-heading: So many tools and tech stacks, multiple great options for you.
HomePage.tech-stack-subheading: We've mastered many stacks over the years—see a few below. Don’t see yours? Just ask— if we support your preferred ones.
HomePage.biggie-heading:
Like Biggie said, it was all a dream—
 Fyndo was built to help.
HomePage.biggie-subheading:
We started Fyndo with one goal—to support founders and investors, especially
 non-technical ones. It came from a good place, built on genuine intentions
 and a mission that still guides us today.
HomePage.biggie-card1-headingone: Whether you’re stuck or starting out, 40+ Fyndooers are ready to jump in.
HomePage.biggie-card1-headingtwo: We don’t employ salespeople. Every Fyndo expert has 8+ years of practical, technical experience—real builders, not theorists. That’s the difference you’ll feel immediately.
HomePage.biggie-card1-headingthree: Juli and Kasi founded Fyndo with love and intention driven by karma, kindness, and the belief that uplifting others brings meaning, and helps build a better, more caring world.
HomePage.biggie-card2-headingtwo: Meet the Founders Behind the Vision of Fyndo
HomePage.biggie-card2-headingthree: Juli and Kasi founded Fyndo with love and intention driven by karma, kindness, and the belief that uplifting others brings meaning, and helps build a better, more caring world.
HomePage.biggie-card3-headingtwo: Fyndo was built with good intentions,  locally hubs in Germany and Poland.
HomePage.biggie-card3-headingthree: Originally founded by German and Polish minds, Fyndo runs from Warsaw, but our remote team worldwide makes us faster, more flexible, and better at balancing work and life.
HomePage.biggie-card4-headingtwo: With a flexible structure, our efficiency enables us to outperform traditional companies—achieving up to six times faster results without sacrificing quality.
HomePage.faq-heading: Got questions? Fyndo has the answers

HomePage.cta-heading:
Talk to a Real Person—
 We’re Here 7 Days a Week for You.
HomePage.cta-text: We’re not just a service—we’re your support team. Message us anytime via email, WhatsApp, Telegram, chat— and usually get back to you fast, like 2–3 hours tops.
HomePage.footer-text:
Fyndo bridges founders and tech—
 faster, clearer, better than traditional methods.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Fyndo, a product of 2digits SP. Z o. o., collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and purchase our digital consulting packages.

whoWeAre.title: 1. Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: Fyndo is a digital consulting platform offering expert IT guidance to non-technical founders and investors. We provide two products online: the Screening Package (for reviewing candidates) and the Estimation Package (for estimating project scope and cost).
whoWeAre.companyDetails:
Company Details:
2digits SP. Z o. o.
ul. Zlota 75A/7
00-819 Warszawa, Poland
VAT Number: PL5273047411
REGON Number: 527416810
KRS Number: 0001024599

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect the following types of data:
items: Personal Information: Name, email, billing details, and company info when you make a purchase or contact us.
Usage Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, and page visits for analytics.
Communication Data: Emails or other messages you send to us.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We only share it with:
items: Trusted service providers (e.g., payment processors, email providers)
Authorities when required by law or legal process

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data. Access is limited to authorized personnel only.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.content: As an EU resident, you have the right to:
items: Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority
yourRights.contact: To exercise your rights, email us at privacy@fyndo.co.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain data as long as necessary for the purposes described above, or as required by law.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential and analytical cookies to enhance user experience. You may disable cookies in your browser settings.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be processed outside the EU in countries with adequate protection standards or under appropriate safeguards.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Fyndo, a digital consulting service by 2digits SP. Z o. o. These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of our website and the purchase of our digital products.

services.title: 1. Services Provided
services.content: Fyndo offers two digital consulting packages:
items: Estimation Package: IT project scoping and estimation
services.note: We provide consulting services only, not development or implementation.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content: By using our services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and have legal capacity to enter into a binding contract.

ordering.title: 3. Ordering and Payment
items: All services are purchased online via our platform.
Prices are in EUR, excluding VAT, which is applied per local rates.
Payments must be made in full before service delivery.
ordering.note: We use secure third-party payment providers. You agree to their terms and conditions when making a purchase

delivery.title: 4. Service Delivery
delivery.content: Services are typically delivered within the agreed timeframe, depending on package type and project complexity. Delays caused by client inaction or missing information are not our responsibility.

refunds.title: 5. Refund Policy
refunds.content: Due to the nature of our digital services, all sales are final. Refunds are only considered if Fyndo fails to deliver the service as described, and after internal review.

responsibilities.title: 6. Client Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You agree to provide accurate and complete information necessary for us to perform the services. Misrepresentation or lack of cooperation may result in service delays or termination.

ip.title: 7. Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content and deliverables provided remain the intellectual property of Fyndo and/or 2digits SP. Z o. o., unless otherwise agreed in writing. You may use deliverables for internal and project-planning purposes only.

warranties.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.content: Fyndo provides consulting services 'as-is' and disclaims all warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee project outcomes or performance based on our recommendations.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Fyndo's total liability for any claim arising out of or related to our services shall not exceed the amount you paid for the specific service.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Warsaw, Poland.

amendments.title: 11. Amendments
amendments.content: We may update these Terms periodically. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.effectiveDate:
Effective Date: June 9, 2025
Last Updated: June 9, 2025
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Fyndo, a product of 2digits SP. Z o. o., uses cookies and similar technologies on our website, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable laws.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to recognize your device and store information about your preferences or actions over time.

cookieTypes.title: Types of Cookies:
items: Session cookies: Deleted when you close your browser.
Persistent cookies: Stored until they expire or are manually deleted.
First-party vs third-party cookies: Set by us or by services we use.

ourCookies.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
ourCookies.table:
Type | Purpose | Examples
Essential | Necessary for website functionality | Session handling
Performance | Help understand visitor interactions | Google Analytics
Functional | Remember user preferences | Language settings
Marketing | Track visitors for advertising | Meta Pixel

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Using Cookies
legalBasis.content: Essential cookies are used based on our legitimate interest. All other cookies require your prior consent through our cookie banner.

managingCookies.title: 4. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managingCookies.content: You can manage cookies via our cookie banner or browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use services like Google Analytics and Meta Pixel which place their own cookies. See their privacy policies for more information.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Cookie Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted here with an updated effective date.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy:
